title: British gaming firm launches world's first online game co-created by players
text:
British gaming firm launches world's first online game co-created by players 5:36pm BST - 02:08
World's Adrift, a highly anticipated multiplayer exploration and adventure simulation game, goes on sale in a bid by British game maker Bossa Studios to develop a massive fantasy universe built by game players themselves. Kate King reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
World's Adrift, a highly anticipated multiplayer exploration and adventure simulation game, goes on sale in a bid by British game maker Bossa Studios to develop a massive fantasy universe built by game players themselves. Kate King reports Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2KAj0RB
